violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: NonFOOD-CONTACT SURFACES of EQUIPMENT shall be cleaned at a frequency necessary to preclude accumulation of soil residues.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIAL shall be stored so they can not contaminate FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, AND SINGLE-SERVICE AND SINGLE-USE ARTICLES by:   
(A) Separating the POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIAL by spacing or partitioning; (P) and   
(B) Locating the POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIAL in an area that is not above FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, AND SINGLE-SERVICE AND SINGLE-USE ARTICLES.  This paragraph does not apply to EQUIPMENT and UTENSIL cleaners and sanitizers that are stored in WAREWASHING areas for availability and convenience if the materials are stored to prevent contamination of FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, AND SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES. (P)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Store toxics below and away from all other items.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
Each HANDWASHING SINK or group of adjacent HANDWASHING SINKS shall be provided with:
(A) Individual, disposable towels; (Pf)
(B) A continuous towel system that supplies the user with a clean towel;(Pf) or 
(C) A heated-air hand drying device.(Pf)
(D) A hand drying device that employs an air-knife system that delivers high velocity pressurized air at ambient temperatures.(Pf)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Working containers used for storing POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIALS such as cleaners and SANITIZERS taken from bulk supplies shall be clearly and individually identified with the common name of the material. (Pf)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: FOOD shall be safe, unADULTERATED and honestly presented. (P)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Do not meet requirements of rule
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Repair/replace to meet requirements of rule.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Except for containers holding FOOD that can be readily and unmistakably recognized such as dry pasta, working containers holding FOOD or FOOD ingredients that are removed from their original packages for use in the FOOD ESTABLISHMENT, such as cooking oils, flour, herbs, potato flakes, salt, spices, and sugar shall be identified with the common name of the FOOD.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: FOOD EMPLOYEES shall wear hair restraints such as hats, hair coverings or nets, beard restraints, and clothing that covers body hair, that are designed and worn to effectively keep their hair from contacting exposed FOOD; clean EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, and LINENS; or unwrapped SINGLE-SERVICE or SINGLE-USE ARTICLES.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Cleaned EQUIPMENT and UTENSILS, laundered LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES shall be stored in an approved manner and location.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Exposed to dust, splash, or other contaminates
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Store in manner that does not contaminate items

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Working containers used for storing POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIALS such as cleaners and SANITIZERS taken from bulk supplies shall be clearly and individually identified with the common name of the material. (Pf)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIAL shall be stored so they can not contaminate FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, AND SINGLE-SERVICE AND SINGLE-USE ARTICLES by:   
(A) Separating the POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIAL by spacing or partitioning; (P) and   
(B) Locating the POISONOUS OR TOXIC MATERIAL in an area that is not above FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, AND SINGLE-SERVICE AND SINGLE-USE ARTICLES.  This paragraph does not apply to EQUIPMENT and UTENSIL cleaners and sanitizers that are stored in WAREWASHING areas for availability and convenience if the materials are stored to prevent contamination of FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, AND SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES. (P)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Store toxics below and away from all other items.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
Except during preparation, cooking, or cooling, or when time is used as the public health control POTENTIALLY HAZARDOUS FOOD (TIME/TEMPERATURE CONTROL FOR SAFETY FOOD) shall be maintained:
(A)  135ºF or above, except that roasts properly cooked and cooled may be held              at a temperature of 130ºF; or (P)
(B)   At 41ºF or less (P)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: An air gap between the water supply inlet and the flood level rim of the PLUMBING FIXTURE, EQUIPMENT, or nonFOOD EQUIPMENT shall be at least twice the diameter of the water supply inlet and may not be less than 1 inch. (P)
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Less than twice the diameter of supply line

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Outer openings of a FOOD ESTABLISHMENT shall be protected against the entry of insects and rodents. Unless otherwise allowed by law.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT that is fixed because it is not EASILY MOVABLE shall be installed so that it is spaced to allow access for cleaning along the sides, behind, and above the EQUIPMENT or sealed as required,  COUNTER-MOUNTED EQUIPMENT that is not EASILY MOVABLE shall be installed to allow cleaning of the EQUIPMENT and areas underneath and around the EQUIPMENT .
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Seal to wall/equipment to facilitate cleaning.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
Materials for indoor floor, wall, and ceiling surfaces under conditions of normal use shall be:
(1) SMOOTH, durable, and EASILY CLEANABLE for areas where FOOD ESTABLISHMENT operations are conducted;
(2) Closely woven and EASILY CLEANABLE carpet for carpeted areas; and
(3) Nonabsorbent for areas subject to moisture such as FOOD preparation areas, walk-in refrigerators, WAREWASHING areas, toilet rooms, mobile FOOD ESTABLISHMENT SERVICING AREAS, and areas subject to flushing or spray cleaning methods.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Not nonabsorbent in areas subject to moisture

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) In FOOD ESTABLISHMENTS in which cleaning methods other than water flushing are used for cleaning floors, the floor and wall junctures shall be coved and closed to no larger than one thirty-second inch.
(B) The floors in FOOD ESTABLISHMENTS in which water flush cleaning methods are used shall be provided with drains and be graded to drain, and the floor and wall junctures shall be coved and SEALED.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT that is fixed because it is not EASILY MOVABLE shall be installed so that it is spaced to allow access for cleaning along the sides, behind, and above the EQUIPMENT or sealed as required,  COUNTER-MOUNTED EQUIPMENT that is not EASILY MOVABLE shall be installed to allow cleaning of the EQUIPMENT and areas underneath and around the EQUIPMENT .
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Seal to wall/equipment to facilitate cleaning.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: A toilet room used by females shall be provided with a covered receptacle for sanitary napkins.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT that is fixed because it is not EASILY MOVABLE shall be installed so that it is spaced to allow access for cleaning along the sides, behind, and above the EQUIPMENT or sealed as required,  COUNTER-MOUNTED EQUIPMENT that is not EASILY MOVABLE shall be installed to allow cleaning of the EQUIPMENT and areas underneath and around the EQUIPMENT .
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Spaced more than 1/32 of an inch from adjoining
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Seal to wall/equipment to facilitate cleaning.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Except otherwise approved, and except for antislip floor coverings or applications may be used for safety reasons, floors, floor coverings, walls, wall coverings, and ceilings shall be designed, constructed, and installed so they are SMOOTH and EASILY CLEANABLE.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: NonFOOD-CONTACT SURFACES of EQUIPMENT that are exposed to splash, spillage, or other FOOD soiling or that require frequent cleaning shall be constructed of a CORROSION-RESISTANT, nonabsorbent, and SMOOTH material.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) In FOOD ESTABLISHMENTS in which cleaning methods other than water flushing are used for cleaning floors, the floor and wall junctures shall be coved and closed to no larger than one thirty-second inch.
(B) The floors in FOOD ESTABLISHMENTS in which water flush cleaning methods are used shall be provided with drains and be graded to drain, and the floor and wall junctures shall be coved and SEALED.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT that is fixed because it is not EASILY MOVABLE shall be installed so that it is spaced to allow access for cleaning along the sides, behind, and above the EQUIPMENT or sealed as required,  COUNTER-MOUNTED EQUIPMENT that is not EASILY MOVABLE shall be installed to allow cleaning of the EQUIPMENT and areas underneath and around the EQUIPMENT .
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Spaced more than 1/32 of an inch from adjoining
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Seal to wall/equipment to facilitate cleaning.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Cleaned EQUIPMENT and UTENSILS, laundered LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES shall be stored in an approved manner and location.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Stored on floor or less than 6 inches above floor
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Store at least 6 inches above the floor.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Founders Brewing Company
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Cleaned EQUIPMENT and UTENSILS, laundered LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES shall be stored in an approved manner and location.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Exposed to dust, splash, or other contaminates
